titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Energy & Natural Resources.
An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Energy & Natural Resources.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Domenici. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary: Authorizes expenditures by the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources for the 108th Congress.
